mapper.select: SELECT n.notification_id AS notificationId, n.content, n.created_at AS createdAt, r.is_read AS isRead FROM notification n JOIN recipients r ON n.notification_id = r.notification_id WHERE r.recipient_id = #{userId} ORDER BY n.created_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recipients WHERE recipient_id = #{userId} AND is_read = FALSE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipients (notification_id, recipient_id, is_read) VALUES (#{notificationId}, #{recipientId}, FALSE)
